text: The University of Lille is a public, multidisciplinary university located in and around Lille, Hauts-de-France.Pourquoi l’université de Lille fusionne-t- elle avec quatre écoles With over 74,000 students, it is one of the largest French universities and one of the largest French-speaking universities in the world.Les trois universités lilloises fusionnent With 66 research laboratories, 350 doctoral theses per year and 3000 scientific publications per year, the institution is well represented in the scientific community.Où va la toute nouvelle Université de Lille ? == Notable teacher == * Michel Foucault, a French philosopher and historian ==References== ==Other websites== * University of Lille, official web site Category:Colleges and universities in France Category:1550s establishments in Europe Category:Lille
title: University of Lille
